goal.en: Both space and the ocean encompass vast expanses, including some remote areas challenging for human exploration. Life on Earth might have originated in space and evolved in the vast oceans, highlighting the interconnectedness of celestial and aquatic realms. Teaching objectives in space science involve understanding the solar system, Earth, and celestial bodies‘ environments, including exposure to harsh space weather and its impact on modern technology. Ocean science aims to foster students‘ understanding of the marine environment, its interaction with human life, and the development of attitudes towards environmental awareness and ocean conservation. Introducing diverse research methods and global perspectives on ocean-related issues enhances students‘ international understanding of marine science.
goal.ch: 太空與海洋都佔有浩瀚的空間，也都有一些邊緣區域，是我們人類難以到達的地方。 地球上的生命，最初可能來自太空，然後在浩瀚的海洋中孕育演化。了解太空與海 洋，可以幫助學生了解地球上生命過去、現在、與未來所面對的環境。在太空科學部 份，主要的教學目標包括了：讓學生了解太陽與地球以及其他行星、衛星、彗星所處 的太空環境。認識惡劣太空天氣的起源以及他們對現代科技生活的影響。同時介紹探 測太空環境的技術以及目前在太空中進行的幾個著名的觀測與實驗。在海洋科學部 份，主要的教學目標如下：讓學生透過認識海洋環境的基本知識，來了解其和人類生 活的交互關係，進而培養其願意了解環境，關懷海洋的態度。另外也希望藉由國際上 不同海洋科學研究方法和海洋相關議題的介紹，讓同學明白世界各國如何看待海洋相 關議題，使他們在海洋方面具有較清楚的國際觀。

content.en:
Week 1: Space Definition and Introduction to the Space-Ocean Relationship (Yen-Hsyang Chu- Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)
Week 2: Space Environment - Interplanetary Space, Earth‘s Magnetosphere, Aurora, Ionosphere (Yen-Hsyang Chu- Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)
Week 3: Sun - Internal and Outer Atmosphere, Magnetic Activities, Solar Events, Sunspots, Solar Flares, Coronal Mass Ejections, Solar Wind (Yen-Hsyang Chu- Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)
Week 4: Solar System Planets and Comets - Meteor Shower Causes (Yen-Hsyang Chu- Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)
Week 5-6: Impact of Space Events on Earth - Dinosaur Extinction, Environmental Changes, Space Weather, and Glaciers (Part 1 and Part 2) (Yen-Hsyang Chu- Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)
Week 7: Exploration of Outer Solar System Planets (Yen-Hsyang Chu- Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)
Week 8: Midterm Examination
Week 9: Introduction - History of Oceanography and Introduction to Seawater Origin Iam-Fei Pun- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences
Week 10-11: Seawater Properties - Physical Properties like Density, Salinity, Temperature, and Chemical Properties Introduction Iam-Fei Pun- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences
Week 12: Ocean Observation Iam-Fei Pun- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences
Week 13-15: Ocean-Atmosphere Interaction, Ocean and Atmospheric Circulation, Typhoons, and El Niño Phenomenon Iam-Fei Pun- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences
Week 16-17: Flexible Classes
Week 18: Final Examination
content.ch:
第1周 太空的定義：太空與海洋關係簡介(朱延祥-太空系)
第2周 太空環境：行星際空間、地球磁層、極光、電 離層(朱延祥-太空系)
第3周 太陽：太陽的內部與外層大氣、磁場活動、太 陽活動、太陽黑子、太陽閃焰、日冕物質拋 射、太陽風(朱延祥-太空系)
第4周 太陽系行星與彗星：流星雨成因(朱延祥-太空系)
第5周 太空事件對地球之影響：以恐龍滅絕、環境變 遷、太空天氣與冰河為例(1)(朱延祥-太空系)
第6周 太空事件對地球之影響：以恐龍滅絕、環境變 遷、太空天氣與冰河為例(2)(朱延祥-太空系)
第7周 外太陽系行星的探索(朱延祥-太空系)
第8周 期中考
第9周 導論:海洋學歷史及海水起源介紹(潘任飛-水海所)
第10周 海水性質:海水密度、鹽度、溫度等物理性質和 成分等化學性質介紹(潘任飛-水海所)
第11周 海水性質:海水密度、鹽度、溫度等物理性質和 成分等化學性質介紹(潘任飛-水海所)
第12周 海洋觀測(潘任飛-水海所)
第13周 海洋大氣交互作用(潘任飛-水海所)
第14周 海洋與大氣環流(潘任飛-水海所)
第15周 颱風與聖嬰現象(潘任飛-水海所)
第16周 彈性上課
第17周 彈性上課
第18周 期末考
